tweet: Come find out about all the research conducted by IOHK, such as Ouroboros, the Proof-of-Stake algorithm designed for Cardano. Our guest speaker will be Professor Kiayias, Chief Scientist at IOHK. RSVP to the event here:  https://t.co/9g8PxD3Vng

This morning, Distributed Futures research program, sponsored by Cardano Foundation, released its latest paper: Timestamping Smart Ledgers - Comparable, Universal, Traceable, Immune. Read it here:  https://t.co/HxieUHEkyt Thanks @LysanderPR  for the photo!  https://t.co/R66x5xOAkF

This morning, Distributed Futures research program, sponsored by Cardano Foundation, released its latest paper: Timestamping Smart Ledgers - Comparable, Universal, Traceable, Immune. Read it here:  https://t.co/F0iJXJX2vE Thanks @LysanderPR  for the photo!  https://t.co/7ZCJRuCdgk

Come find out about all the research conducted by IOHK, such as Ouroboros, the Proof-of-Stake algorithm designed for Cardano. Our guest speaker will be Professor Kiayias, Chief Scientist at IOHK. RSVP to the event here:  https://t.co/222uweYYf7

Small afternoon update:  - $BTC has strong BB squeeze on multiple timeframes.  - Many altcoins ( $KMD, $NANO, $IOTA, $ADA, $NEBL and more) have bullish divergences on small AND big timeframes.   Combined I'd suggest that we're moving upwards in the coming hours/days.

The Cardano proposal page on @StackExchange has moved to the 'commitment' stage. Please commit to support the site by submitting and answering questions. If you are already using other sites on Stack Exchange, you can also support Cardano here:  https://t.co/nlCtOwJQcv #Cardano  https://t.co/45YZC3TfAK

Watch the video from the recent inaugural #Cardano meetup for #developers at University College London @ucl here, organised by @CardanoStiftung, featuring the IOHK senior development team including Duncan Coutts, Neil Davies, Philipp Kant, and Darko Mijic:  https://t.co/IDpCEEkIN0

.@LarsBrunjes is leading the work on incentives in #Cardano, the means of encouraging people to participate in the protocol and behave in a way that is in the best interests of all users and the system as a whole. Watch his presentation on incentives here:  https://t.co/WMtu41fMVz

During the last week, I noticed that there was a selling pressure on the vast majority of the altcoins while buying these 4 big caps coins. I was looking at $ADA $XRP $ETH $LTC $XMR and $EOS. The rest I chose randomly to get a better idea. Institutional choice? any thoughts?  https://t.co/wweAQrwoH5
